text: Here's seven foods you can grow indoors with limited space. Radishes, green onions. This was one day of growth. Microgreens, jar sprouts. Lettuce is a good one. Smart garden not required. Peppers. Smart garden also not required and these are smaller varieties but a lot of pepper plants don't get taller than three feet. And my personal favorite, dwarf cherry tomatoes. Like and follow for more videos like this.
